# ----- Book-to-Market factor -----------------------------------
book_equity = ts_backfill(df["balance_totalStockholdersEquity"])
btm_raw = book_equity / df["cap"]

alpha = group_neutralize(
            group_rank_normalized(btm_raw, subindustry),
            subindustry)

custom_feature = cs_winsor(alpha, limits=(0.02, 0.98)).rename("custom_feature")
